subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: South Africa routed England, 36-0, in their World Cup group match, handing the defending champion its biggest defeat in 30 games at the tournament. England, which has slipped to seventh from first in the rankings, was missing its captain, Phil Vickery, because of a suspension. Its regular fly-half, Jonny Wilkinson, and his backup, Olly Barkley, were injured.
